Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getDefinitionArgument()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getHookType()
    cast to HookTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getPattern()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getPickleStep()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getStepArgument()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getStepLine()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getStepLocation()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.getStepText()
    cast to PickleStepTestStep instead.
    cucumber.api.TestStep.isHook()
    type check HookTestStep or PickleStepTestStep instead.
